name: Le Sareymond

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We chose Le Sareymond because its village, Menee, seemed perfectly located as a base for heading out for some driving tours into the Alps and because it was so well reviewed by other visitors.
reviews.title: A great stay.

reviews.text: Menee turned out to be a perfect base. Unfortunately, the direct route north, through the Col de Menee, was closed due to a rock slide, but we chose other routes using other cols and were treated to two days of spectacular scenery. Early May is the off season, so when we got onto the secondary roads, we were pretty much alone.
reviews.title: perfect!

reviews.text: Le Sareymond was a treat. We were the only guests for our three nights and Digna was alone as hostess, so it was very low key. It might feel different if every room was full.
reviews.title: The perfect chance to become totaly relaxed

description: Discover our unique B&B Le Sareymond in Menée (Treschenu-Creyers) in a typical south-french style village, surrounded by magnificent mountains. Ideally located for hikes, cultural visits to closeby medieval villages, markets with local products, vineyards, wine degustation, extra-ordinary nature and much much more. Welcome in Le Sareymond .....
